item.title: How to create a hex grid using shaders in Godot engine
item.description: Godot is an advanced, open-source engine for developing 2D and 3D games. In this article, we show how to implement a hexagonal grid using shaders.

item.title: Retriever of Lost Dreams
item.description: Your name is Rold. You live in a very special place in the Universe. This place is called Dreamland. Your job is to foster and guard the Dream Stars. For, from their stardust, the people’s dreams are born.
